tools.name: getSalesOrder
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific sales order, including header fields and line items

orderId.description: The internal ID of the sales order to retrieve

tools.name: getSalesOrderWithFilters
tools.description: Search and retrieve sales orders with optional filtering by customer, date range, and status. Remember for dates, always use MM/DD/YYYY format

customerId.description: Filter by specific customer internal ID

dateFrom.description: Start date for date range filter (MM/DD/YYYY)

dateTo.description: End date for date range filter (MM/DD/YYYY)

tools.name: generateSalesReport
tools.description: Generates a Sales Report of your NetSuite Account. Always use MM/DD/YYYY format for dates. You can choose between 'customer', 'date' or leave empty for default grouping

dateFrom.description: Start date of the sales report in MM/DD/YYYY format

dateTo.description: End date of the sales report in MM/DD/YYYY format

grouping.description: Grouping of columns. Can be [customer, date] or empty for default grouping
